评论详情: These are comfy, true to size. Like the pockets and fit.

评论概述: Cute & Comfy! I sized up for the baggy slouchy look.

评论详情: They’re super cute and the material is very thick. They do not look or feel cheap. The waistband is thick too.  I ordered a large based on the reviews. I had to return and size up because of my hips and butt. If you are curvy size up they will be tight on your hips.
Nice fit sporty look.  Comfortable

I am a women’s size 10 and I’m 5’9”. I went with an XL, despite the recommended Large and I’m so glad I did! These aren’t fully baggy, but more of a “loose fit”. There isn’t much structure to these, as they’re made from a cotton material, but they’re loose enough for what I wanted. The coloring can scrape off with your thumbnail. The good thing about them is that if I wear them and my hip, they’re easily long enough (low rise style for those who were older than 12 in the ‘90s/‘00s!). They’re not lined and the fabric, while being a cotton blend of some kind, isn’t stiff. They’re definitely not what you’d think of when you consider cargo pants. But hey, they were less than $30 (before tax) so they’re not breaking the bank.

Wanted these to work so bad. I have a booty and thighs and a slim waist and unfortunately these didn't work for me. If they had just a little bit of stretch to them it would have worked but they are 100% cotton and thus have no give. Luckily they fit my teenage daughter great!

I was very pleasantly surprised by these pants. I had some doubts when I first put them on but they grew on me. They are great quality, great for working outside with my animals. Very sturdy and durable.

I purchased a size medium, and they fit well even for a short person! (Just under 5’2”) I currently weigh around 135 which is at the heavier end of my normal spectrum, but they have a drawstring so they would fit well even on a much thinner frame, depending on the bagginess desired. The material has a good thickness to it without being heavy or restricting. The inner pockets are interesting as they are made of what seems to be the same material that tents and rain flys are made out of… But it’s really not an issue for me at all. They are large and roomie, just a little noisier as you pull items in and out.

Loving these camo pants! I am 5’6” and they are long in length, but you can use the ankle drawstring for a different look. Great stretch around the waistband. The material feels like a lightweight canvas. Very happy with these!

Super comfortable, the material quality is good for all year wear, the color is true to the description, nice and long with adjustable elastic at the ankles, pockets I think this is a good value for the money.
obsessed with them! comfy and cute
These pants are not worth 20.00 maybe 7.00 . The material is harsh and they are poorly sewn! BUYER BEWARE
I love how these look & they’re decently comfortable.
The material wasn’t very comfortable and they run a bit small even when sizing up..
Scratchy and not a good quality, more like a camo sack made into pants. Super thin.
These were a little tight at the hips but loosened up through the day. Pretty comfortable, I like them!
So comfortable and the perfect about of baggy! I get so many compliments on them! They are my favorite pants.
I like them. They are very comfortable. I ordered a size up so they would fit lose and baggy.

perfect length at 5'-7", comfortable and fun
These are true to size. I don’t love the cuff or the ability to cuff the bottom. Didn’t look like that in the picture. Material is a little stiff.

I originally ordered these in a (M). The day they were supposed to arrive (11/20), I received an email saying it was running late and wouldn’t arrive till 11/30. I decided to reorder in a (L). I like the (L). They have a nice baggy look. There’s no stretch, but they have loosened up a bit. Today the (M) arrived. I considered returning them, but dedicated to try them on first. They fit. They aren’t loose and baggy like the (L), but I’m sure they will loosen up a little once I’ve worn them for a day. I’m 5’5”/155lbs  W35.5”/H40” for reference. I’ve decided to keep both pairs since I’ve been on a weight loss journey and eventually the (L) will be too loose.
My 13 year old loves these cargo pants!! They look so good on and the fit is great!!
Love the way these fit and instantly upgrade my “mom” outfit. This is a trend I can get behind!!!

I sized up for a super slouchy look. Happy with the fit. The material is super nice. The bottom scrunch was great since I’m short. The waist band wasn’t too constricting which is always great. Love wearing these.

I'm 5'7" and a size 14. I ordered the XL and they fit great. Not too tight or loose but still have a nice baggy look to them without being sloppy looking. Material is a thin jean like to a super thick cotton. Love the fit, love the pattern, and love the feel! Washes well too.
Comfy cargo pants, pants are as advertised in picture
Comfy pants that went great with the outfit my daughter wore.

They don’t fit me like they fit the model in the pics.  I’m 5’8, 150 lbs, got xl, and they’re too short, have a weird waist, and weird cut.  On someone shorter, they’d probably be pretty cute.  Material doesn’t feel amazing, it’s not terrible, but not my favorite.  Kinda stiff, itchy a little.

I had to order these pants twice because the elastic broke the first time when wearing the pants the replacement pair came and the elastic literally broke again while putting the pants on love these pants and the fit, but the ankles elastic is very cheap and not reliable

I got a XL. The fit was just what I was hoping for. Kinda fitted in the hips and fell very nicely. Love the draw sting waist. 10 out of 10!
Absolutely love these pants! Had to exchange for a size up as I didn’t want them too fitted. They are comfortable and look great on with a fitted top. Would def recommend

I bought these for my 5’4 , 100 lb, 12 year old. They fit her perfectly. They weren’t cheap, but they were definitely worth the price.

i love the pants but i hate that amazon doesn’t check them if they’re returned before they’re sent to someone else. there was a used tube of lipstick and a necklace in the pocket when it was delivered 🤢

I weigh 135 5’5” and I got a size small. Love them!!!!!! The material is nice…. The fit was perfect… lotsa pockets …. Elastic waist.

I needed loose camo pants for a “costume” and I was apprehensive because I have wide hips, a big butt and thick thighs so finding loose pants is very challenging. These fit just how I was hoping, they’re baggy but not too baggy, the material isn’t too thick (but not thin and cheap either). They’re a cotton material so probably not super durable, but they work for a specific outfit or occasional wear. I will definitely be buying more in different colors/styles.  For reference, my hips are ~46in wide, my waist about 32in and my thighs are probably ~34in around and I got size XL (I’m typically XL in leggings, but can occ. go down to L depending on the stretch).

I needed these for a Bootcamp Retreat.  These pants did not disappoint.  They were a bit stiff at first.  But, they soften up nicely.  Love the wide leg option.  You can also use the toggle option to create a jogger type look.  The material was medium weight and breathable.  Since I was in 119 degree heat wave.  The breathable fabric was wonderful.  Synthetic fabric would have created a sauna effect.  Great pant for the price.
Color and design exactly like the picture. I have many pants with the same texture and feel to these so I knew what to expect going in. Absolutely love wearing these with my boots.
